text: <@U3T21PDBK> mine is still broken - won't retrieve records after thursday
<@U6W3H6YN8> has there been any noted issues with GraphQL's API?
Any issues related to the CRM outage should be resolved. If it is a pre-rendered CMS page you might need to update the template or page to invalidate the cache
which is when the search API went down?
I think it is likely unrelated. So the GraphQL API is not returning any data for you
it returns, just nothing past the 25th - very odd
thats weird, it all of a sudden works
